INTRODUCE YOURSELF AND SPEAK TO THE RESPONDENT.
Good morning/afternoon/evening. My name is ________________. I am working with Radius Global, an independent market research company. Today we are here to discuss about insurance policy within your organisation. This survey will take about 15 minutes to complete. Whatever information you provide will be kept strictly confidential and will not be disclosed to any third party. It will only be analysed at an aggregate level along with responses from others. We hope that you will take part in this survey since your participation is important. Please know there are no right or wrong answers and we are only interested in your honest feedback. May I begin the interview now?
Thank you for participating. For this survey, please think about current insurance program offered by your insurance provider.
Q1 . To what extent are you involved in decision-making for the purchase of the employee benefits package in your organization ?
Question.QuestionAnswer: I influence the decision but someone else is the primary decision-maker

Answer.Text: I influence the decision but someone else is the primary decision-maker

Question.Text: Q2 . Which of the below insurance providers are you currently dealing with for your employee’s health insurance in the UAE?
Q3 . What department do you currently work in as part of your organization?
Q4 . Approximately, how many full-time salaried employees does your company have across all you’re established in the UAE?

Q5 . Below are a few statements that can be used to describe different companies established/operating in the UAE. Please could you indicate below the statement that applies to your organization the most?
Question.QuestionAnswer: A regional company with offices in more than one Gulf Country

Answer.Text: A regional company with offices in more than one Gulf Country

Question.Text: Q6 . And how would you describe the industry in which your company operates? Please tell me from this list

Answer.Text: Service industry (Advertising, Marketing Consultants, Market Research, Education, Media, Transport, IT)

Question.Text: Q7 . How would you describe the type of employees in your organization?

Today we are here to discuss about insurance policy within your organisation. This survey will take about 15 minutes to complete. Whatever information you provide will be kept strictly confidential and will not be disclosed to any third party. It will only be analysed at an aggregate level along with responses from others. We hope that you will take part in this survey since your participation is important. Please know there are no right or wrong answers and we are only interested in your honest feedback. May I begin the interview now?
Thank you for participating. For this survey, please think about current insurance program offered by your insurance provider.
Q1 . To what extent are you involved in decision-making for the purchase of the employee benefits package in your organization ?
Question.QuestionAnswer: I contribute equally along with someone else, sharing responsibility to decide what employee benefits packages are purchased

Answer.Text: I contribute equally along with someone else, sharing responsibility to decide what employee benefits packages are purchased

Q3 . What department do you currently work in as part of your organization?
